name: sccccmanagement
description: Management utilities for SCCCC written in GAS

scripts.git:enforce-clean-and-get-commit: git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || (echo "\nERROR: Git working directory is not clean. Commit or stash your changes before proceeding.\n" && git status --short && exit 1) && export GIT_COMMIT_FULL="$(git rev-parse HEAD)" && export GIT_COMMIT_SHORT="$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)" && echo "Git clean. Commit: ${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT}"
scripts.clasp:create-version: npm run git:enforce-clean-and-get-commit && npx @google/clasp version "Version created from Git Commit: ${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} (${GIT_COMMIT_FULL}) on $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')"
scripts.dev:create-version: npm run set-dev-env && npx @google/clasp version "Dev Version $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')"
scripts.stage:redeploy: npm run set-dev-env && npx @google/clasp deploy --deploymentId "${npm_package_config_CLASP_STAGING_DEPLOYMENT_ID}" --versionNumber "$(npx @google/clasp versions | tail -n 1 | awk '{print $1}')" --description "Staging"
scripts.stage:deploy: npm run stage:push && npm run clasp:create-version && npm run stage:redeploy && echo "\nStaging deployment updated to latest code and versioned with Git. Access via: ${npm_package_config_GAS_BASE_DOMAIN}/${npm_package_config_CLASP_STAGING_DEPLOYMENT_ID}${npm_package_config_GAS_EXEC_PATH}\n"
scripts.prod:redeploy-live: npm run set-prod-env  && npx @google/clasp deploy --deploymentId "${npm_package_config_CLASP_PROD_LIVE_DEPLOYMENT_ID}" --versionNumber "$(npx @google/clasp versions | tail -n 1 | awk '{print $1}')" --description "Production (v$(npm pkg get version)) - $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')"
scripts.prod:deploy-live: npm run prod:push && npm run clasp:create-version && npm run prod:redeploy-live && echo "\nProduction deployment updated to v$(npm pkg get version) and versioned with Git. Access via: ${npm_package_config_GAS_BASE_DOMAIN}/${npm_package_config_CLASP_PROD_LIVE_DEPLOYMENT_ID}${npm_package_config_GAS_EXEC_PATH}\n"
